component.name: createSpreadsheet
component.description: Create a Spreadsheet with a given name

component.name: createWorksheet
component.description: Create a worksheet with a given name

component.name: importCSV
component.description: Import CSV data into a worksheet

component.name: usernameLogin
component.description: Log in to the google account with username and password

component.name: searchCell
component.description: Search a cell with a given string

component.name: purgeWorksheet
component.description: Purge (delete) data in a worksheet

component.name: deleteWorksheet
component.description: Delete an entire worksheet with its data

component.name: getAllSpreadsheets
component.description: Retrieve all spreadsheets for a particular google account

component.name: getAllWorksheets
component.description: Retrieve all worksheets for a given spreadsheet

component.name: updateWorksheetMetadata
component.description: Update metadata of a given worksheet

component.name: getAllCells
component.description: Retrieve all cells with data for a given worksheet

component.name: getAllCellsCSV
component.description: Retrieve all cells with data for a given worksheet in csv format

component.name: getAuthors
component.description: Retrieve authors of a given spreadsheet or worksheet

component.name: getCellRange
component.description: Retrieve cells containing data for a given cell range

component.name: getCellRangeCSV
component.description: Retrieve cells containing data for a given cell range in csv format

component.name: getColumnHeaders
component.description: Retrieve column headers for a given worksheet

component.name: setRow
component.description: Set a specific row with the given data

component.name: init
component.description: configure googlespreadsheet related setup

component.name: getSpreadsheetsByTitle
component.description: Retrieve spreadsheets with the given title

component.name: getWorksheetsByTitle
component.description: Retrieve worksheets with the given title
